slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Dice 6 Fever comes with the latest HOT & COLD bonus! Increase your chances of winning up to 18x JACKPOT! Just guess the numbers 1 to 6, Big or Small, and Odd or Even.

slide-2.title: Hot & Cold
content: The system randomly assigns bets into Hot and Cold categories. There are 10 bets: numbers 1-6, odd/even, and big/small. In a single round, all categories can appear together, or all bets might fall into the same category.

slide-3.title: Jackpot
content: Bets in the Jackpot category receive much higher payouts than normal. Only bets on numbers 1 to 6 can qualify for the Jackpot, and only one number will be selected.
